author: stsp
msg: * subversion/tests/cmdline/merge_tests.py
(merge_file_replace_to_mixed_rev_wc): Remove a redundant update which
used to be necessary in the past, but isn't with the current code.
Should the update ever become required again the commit following
it should fail, so removing the update should have no real impact
on the regression test.

author: gstein
msg: Fix some outdated stylistic conventions. Whitespace should not occur
before a open-parentheses that is part of a function definition,
declaration, or type definition. In all these cases, shift the open-paren
up one line to the func/type name.
No functional change.
* subversion/include/svn_delta.h:
* subversion/include/svn_types.h:
* subversion/include/svn_wc.h:
* subversion/include/svn_cmdline.h:
* subversion/include/svn_client.h:
* subversion/include/svn_auth.h:
* subversion/include/svn_opt.h:
* subversion/include/svn_ra.h:
(): adjust declarations to avoid whitespace before func paren.
Found by: blair

author: julianfoad
msg: Code reduction and minor tweaks, following up on r38973.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/stream.c
(line_transformer): Add a scratch_pool argument and use it instead of
creating a sub-pool. Initialize the output pointer to null so that the
assertion of it getting set to non-null has a chance of working.
(svn_stream_readline): Rework a little to avoid duplicated code. Add
some comments.

author: gstein
msg: Fix a style problem with a parentheses, and fix up some comment layout
around @since tags to better match other precedent.
* subversion/include/svn_io.h: small style tweaks. no functional change.

author: hwright
msg: Remove an access baton in loggy in favor of just using the admin absolute path.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/log.c
(loggy_move_copy_internal): Get rid of the access baton argument, and just
use the baton's absolute path.
(svn_wc__loggy_copy, svn_wc__loggy_move): Update callers.
